# GetAudioObjectForObjectID

**Instance Method**

Gets a pointer to an audio object, given the object’s identifier.

## Declaration

```swift
OSSharedPtr<IOUserAudioObject> GetAudioObjectForObjectID(IOUserAudioObjectID in_object_id);
```

## Parameters

- **in_object_id**: The [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioObjectID] of an object previously added to the driver.

## Return Value

An `OSSharedPtr` to an [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioObject] if `in_object_id` was found.

## Working with Audio Objects

- **AddObject**: Adds an audio object to the driver.
- **RemoveObject**: Removes an audio object from the driver.
